item.description:
September User Group:: PHP Show-and-tell

OK, the gig is up! Time for you to step out of the audience and show us what you're working on. BostonPHP will host a series of 15 minute "show-and-tells" in a very informal and highly interactive format.

If you'd like to present your project, talk about PHP/OSS, or tell us what you did for summer vacation, please sign up at http://www.bostonphp.....
item.name: Boston PHP September Meetup
